text: Tom Peckham (born December 28, 1943) is an American wrestler. He competed in the men's freestyle 87 kg at the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:American male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of the United States Category:Wrestlers at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:People from Cresco, Iowa Category:Sportspeople from Iowa
title: Tom Peckham
